Class MongoDBMultiRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.writer.AbstractRecordWriter
      • org.easybatch.core.writer.AbstractMultiRecordWriter
        • org.easybatch.integration.mongodb.MongoDBMultiRecordWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordProcessor, RecordWriter

    public class MongoDBMultiRecordWriter
extends AbstractMultiRecordWriter
    Writes a list of Mongo DBObject to a given collection in bulk mode.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
